results.title: Genre
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
A day in the life of a blocked screenwriter. A film producer is harassing a screenwriter who is suffering major problems trying to come up with a script for his next movie. This short film visually depicts the film scenarios this writer conjures up - a mystery and gangster style thriller. Neither of these stories satisfy the frustrated screenwriter, and so he ends up writing a simple love story between two ordinary people. Finally he finishes the script and rushes to the post box to send his script to the producer. Upon arriving at the letter box, he meets the woman of his dreams. His screenwriting dreams become a reality.

results.title: End of the Line
results.brief_description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival. Fleeing from town, a small child finds himself hiding in a seemingly deserted railway station. One day he is crossing the tracks when a train come hurtling towards him. A beautifully photographed film, imbued with feelings of isolation and loneliness.

results.title: Crushed
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
A young man, in his disgust at watching a terrible film entitled “Fear”, makes the dramatic decision to run it over several times with his car.

results.title: Can you stop the music?
results.brief_description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.This documentary asks local councils, residential associations and live music venue operators to give their views on the impact that inner-city gentrification has had on the live music scene in Melbourne. The once strong scene has seen a decline in the number of venues due to the increasing demand for inner city living.

results.title: Attack of the strange insects from Uranus
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This mockumentary, depicting the zombie apocalypse, contains a hilarious collection of violence and gore. (Note that some scenes may disturb some viewers).

results.title: Light a candle
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This documentary recounts the story of a woman’s horrific past experiences of the Holocaust. Photographs and interviews are part of this film which highlights the fact that no matter how abominably bad Nazis treated the Jews during World War 2, this woman’s unshakeable faith in her Jewish faith and identity as part of the Jewish race remains strong. A moving story about a race surviving against all odds.
